# receive(subscription:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the subscriber that it has successfully subscribed to the publisher and may request items.

## Declaration

```swift
final func receive(subscription: any Subscription)
```

## Parameters

- **subscription**: A subscription that represents the connection between publisher and subscriber.

## Discussion

Use the received [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Subscription] to request items from the publisher.

## Receiving life cycle events

- **receive(completion:)**: Tells the subscriber that the publisher has completed publishing, either normally or with an error.
